extra.enrollment_requirement:
RECOMMENDATION    Ontario Grade 10 Mathematics.
ONE-WAY EXCLUSION    May not be taken with or after 12.0 units in MATH; STAT at the 100-level and above.

basic.description:
Topics in mathematics, emphasizing patterns, problem solving, applications. Connections between contemporary mathematics and society. Emphasis on number systems, arithmetic, combinatorics, graph theory. Of interest to prospective teachers.
NOTE    Does not prepare student for other courses in mathematics or statistics. This course may not be included in any MATH or STAT plan.
RECOMMENDATION    Ontario Grade 10 Mathematics.
basic.subject: MATH
basic.title: Elementary Concepts in Discrete Mathematics
